entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:49 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 1:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
